/* USE : ProdImgMapper.getProdList */
SELECT thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CD, thp.PROD_NM, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD, ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('H', thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM, NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS SALE_UPRC, -- 판매단가 thp.USE_YN
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROD_CD, MIN(SALE_UPRC) KEEP( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY START_DATE DESC ) AS SALE_UPRC FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND END_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND SALE_PRC_FG = #{salePrcFg} GROUP BY HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROD_CD ) thpsp ON thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.PROD_CD = thpsp.PROD_CD WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND thp.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND thp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%' --상품코드
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND BARCD_CD = #{barCd} ) --바코드
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND thp.USE_YN = #{useYn} --사용여부
ORDER BY thp.PROD_CD ASC
SELECT tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD, ( SELECT SF_GET_PROD_CLASSES('S', tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD) FROM DUAL ) AS PROD_CLASS_NM, NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS SALE_UPRC, -- 판매단가 tmp.USE_YN
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT STORE_CD, PROD_CD, MIN(SALE_UPRC) KEEP( DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY START_DATE DESC ) AS SALE_UPRC FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND END_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND SALE_PRC_FG = #{salePrcFg} GROUP BY STORE_CD, PROD_CD ) thpsp ON tmp.STORE_CD = thpsp.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD = thpsp.PROD_CD INNER JOIN TB_MS_STORE tms ON tms.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
AND tmp.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%' --상품코드
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%' --상품명
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND BARCD_CD = #{barCd} ) --바코드
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND tmp.USE_YN = #{useYn} --사용여부
ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD ASC
